items.content_html: The Camera Blocker browser extension is a lightweight and user-friendly tool designed to give users control over their webcam access across all websites. Inspired by the need for enhanced privacy and security, this extension allows users to quickly enable or disable their camera with a simple toggle button, acting as a virtual camera shutter.

Inspired by the need for enhanced privacy and security, this extension allows users to quickly enable or disable their camera with a simple toggle button, acting as a virtual camera shutter.

items.content_html: Serverless platform to deploy static websites, web apps, services, IoT projects without any vendor and framework lock-in. Lightweight alternative to Kubernetes and PaaS(Heroku, Render and others). Deploy web projects on virtually any cloud provider/Raspberry Pi/old laptop in minutes.
